alert.note: Alert for Siskiyou (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 19 at 6:29PM PDT until August 19 at 7:30PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: The National Weather Service in Medford has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Northwestern Siskiyou County in northern California... * Until 730 PM PDT. * At 629 PM PDT, Emergency management reported thunderstorms producing flash flooding near the Happy Camp area. Flash flooding is ongoing. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Emergency management reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Happy Camp and Curley Jack Campground. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
